item.title: Looking for a video editor for my Economics channel - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a professional and experienced video editor to handle the full video creation process, producing high quality Youtube content/videos in length of around 9 minutes, 12 videos produced per month.

*Please read this carefully before applying for this job.*

The ideal candidate/team will have worked on YouTube automation channels before with measurable success, have extensive knowledge of the Youtube guidelines/copyright rules/fair use policies, strong editing skills and access to Stock Footage sites as well as experience with and use of VidIQ or Tubebuddy. Videos must be able to be monetized.

We Want to Work With You If:
- You understand how to keep viewers engaged with good pacing, transitions etc. - You have experience working under tight deadlines
- You are committed to high quality without the need for lots of revisions.
- You have experience in producing bingeable content with Youtube.
- You are organized, communicative and has fast turnaround times.
- You can deliver items via (Google Drive/Trello)
- You have a sense of humor

Video requirements:
- Video workflow: 10 second bait intro, the content in the body edited in a way that is funny, engaging and entertaining. Ending with channel end screens.
- Add in copyright free sound effects/background music where applicable, not in excess.
- Source and use copyright free clips and have stock footage access to use licensed clips where necessary.
- Edit the video in a bingeable type style that is captivating to the audience, CTR and retention rate focused, 1080p HD+, make use of lower-thirds/text/transitions where applicable. Professional video editing software only - Adobe Premiere Pro, Davinci Resolve or Final Cut Pro.

Why we are awesome to work with:
- You'll fill your portfolio with a variety of professional video samples
- We have high-quality standards, which means awesome training – you'll learn a ton
- Work from wherever you want (as long as we can reach you)
- There is PLENTY of work to go around, and no cap on what you can edit
- We recognize talent and promote from within
- Kickass bonuses and incentives

Job requirements:
- 3 videos per week
- 8 minutes + videos
Priority given to the video editor that best matches the Job Description.

If you want to apply for the job, put the word ocean in your message. Then I know you have read this description. Just like your video price.


Please send current portfolio/sample work for review.


Posted On: June 26, 2024 07:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Marketing Agency - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to create promotional videos for our marketing agency. The main objective is to showcase the work we have completed for our clients in an engaging and visually appealing way. The videos will be used for marketing purposes across various platforms. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video editing principles and possess creative storytelling abilities. Attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines are also crucial for this role.

Examples of what we want to achieve:
https://elements.envato.com/unique-website-promotion-VWG4GB5
https://elements.envato.com/fast-website-promo-BLPBNNA

We can provide figma boards and live website urls that you can pull imagery from.

Relevant skills:
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Familiarity with motion graphics and visual effects
- Strong sense of visual storytelling and composition
- Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 07:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Australia

item.title: Expert Advisor for Podcast and Online Course Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an expert to assist in the creation of a podcast and an online course focusing on the connection between science, spirituality, and religion. Our goal is to produce high-quality, realistic content similar to the style of:
https://www.youtube.com/@morgueofficial


*Responsibilities:*
- Provide expert advice on the best tools and technologies to use for creating realistic AI-generated videos using the applicant's voice and image.
- Guide the production process to ensure high-quality output.
- Assist with the setup and execution of the podcast and online course, ensuring they are engaging and informative.

*Requirements:*
- Extensive experience in podcast and online course creation.
- Knowledge of AI technologies for realistic video and audio production.
- Ability to advise on and implement the best tools and practices for our specific needs.




Posted On: June 26, 2024 07:05 UTC
Category: AI Video Generation & Editing
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Video Production, Podcast, Video Editing
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Video Production, Podcast, Video Editing

item.title: Short testimonial video for Youtube and Instagram - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, brief below. Any questions, let me know!

Testimonial Video Brief

*I'll send over the original interview to be edited along with the additional content that can be used when I find the right freelancer*

Purpose: Creating a video testimonial to use on the new Catalyst website and social media to help boost the brand's credibility.

Outputs:
An edited testimonial video in both landscape for the website adn in an Instagram reel format. The video needs to including the answers to questions 1, 2, 3 and 4 below.

Notes:
- It would be great to have screenshots of results or Matcha content blended in to help make the video more interesting.
- To make it more concise don’t include me asking any questions use text overlay instead with the questions.
- Text overlay needs to use Catalyst branding (orange background and black text for example).
- Can you please add some background music to the clip to make it more engaging

Guidelines:

Video sections to be cropped and used from the interview

Question 1: Who are you and what do you do? (Text overlay in Catalyst branding if possible)
Answer to be used - 10:20-10:32 (12 seconds)

Question 2: Why did you invest in a digital marketing partner? (Text overlay)
Answer to be used - 10:41-11:03 (22 seconds)

Question 3: What results have you seen from working with Catalyst Digital over the past 6-months? (Text overlay)
Answer to be used - 18:26-18:42 (16 seconds)

Question 4: If you were to start all over again… what would you do differently? (Text overlay)
Answer to be used - 8:56-9:28 (32 seconds)

B-roll content
Anything from - https://www.instagram.com/matchamatchanz/
Screen recording of website (Attached)
Screenshot of Shopify sales to back up 90% claim (Actual figures would need to be blurred out) (Attached)

Examples of testimonial videos I like
1 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g04whoDdXeo
2 - https://www.instagram.com/p/C05DAwwS8Cn/
3 - Defiant Digital testimonials - see 4 examples below and preview the videos here - https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?active_status=all&ad_type=all&country=AU&view_all_page_id=2118286015108325&search_type=page&media_type=all  


Budget: $40
Posted On: June 26, 2024 07:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Video Enhancement, Video Production, Testimonial Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Social Video Enhancement, Video Production, Testimonial Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: New Zealand
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Faceless YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Position Overview:
We are in search of a talented and dedicated Video Editor to join our team on a long-term basis. As the Video Editor, you will be responsible for crafting compelling videos based on provided scripts and concepts. Your primary task will involve editing video content, incorporating AI-generated voiceovers, and ensuring the final product is captivating and aligned with our channel's tone and style.

Key Responsibilities:

Edit video content in adherence to provided scripts and general concepts.
Incorporate AI-generated voiceovers seamlessly into the videos.
Create engaging visual narratives using various editing techniques.
Collaborate with the content creator to ensure the video content meets channel standards and objectives.
Maintain consistency in style, tone, and branding across all videos.
Stay updated on video editing trends and tools to enhance production quality.
Qualifications:

Proven experience in video editing, preferably for YouTube or similar platforms.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Ability to work creatively with provided scripts and concepts.
Experience in incorporating voiceovers and audio editing.
Strong attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality, engaging content.
Understanding of YouTube's content standards and audience engagement metrics.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 26, 2024 06:57 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Intro & Outro, Education, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Intro & Outro, Education, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Country: Pakistan
click to apply

item.title: Videographer for Social Media Content for a Luxury Fashion Brand - Upwork
item.description:
If you have experience creating quality video content for social media platforms, apply now!

Your primary role is to create engaging videos that fit our luxury fashion brand and the overall marketing plan. This includes:
- Short promotional videos in vertical format
- Behind-the-scenes footage
- Product showcases

You will be required to do research, coordinate and execute video shoots, edit videos, and finalize videos for social media platforms such as Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube. We'll provide the product for you.

This is a minimum 2-month project with an option to extend into a longer contract.

You must be detail-oriented and familiar with current trends in social media and ad video content. If you read this, begin your message with the word “Elegance”.

P.S. We plan to pay up to $3,000 💵🤩 when we get the desired results. Until then, we're ready to pay you $1000 monthly for 10h/week. Plus, of course, shooting expenses reimbursement


Budget: $3,000
Posted On: June 26, 2024 06:49 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Fashion & Beauty, Product Photography, Product Listings, Lifestyle, Business, People, Videography, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Fashion & Beauty, Product Photography, Product Listings, Lifestyle, Business, People, Videography, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: South Korea
click to apply

item.title: Creating learning videos - Upwork
item.description:
Responsibilities:

Research and identify key educational topics to create video content on.
Develop engaging and informative scripts for educational videos.
Create visually appealing and interactive video content to enhance the learning experience.
Collaborate with subject matter experts to ensure the accuracy and relevance of the educational material.
Edit and enhance video content to meet quality and production standards.
Stay abreast of best practices in educational video production and adapt content creation strategies accordingly.
Requirements:

Proven experience in creating educational video content for online platforms.
Strong creative and storytelling skills.
Proficiency in video editing software and tools.
Excellent communication and organizational skills.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team.
Understanding of different learning styles and how to create engaging educational content.
Knowledge of educational technologies and trends in online learning.
A degree in Education, Multimedia Design, Communications, or related field is a plus.

Budget: $25

We are seeking a skilled video editor to create and edit engaging content for our Instagram reels. As a video editor, you will be responsible for selecting and arranging footage, adding effects and transitions, and ensuring the final output meets our brand standards. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Instagram trends and be able to produce high-quality, visually appealing reels that capture our audience's attention. item.title: Youtube video edition - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
We are seeking a talented and creative freelance video editor to join our team and assist in editing engaging and high-quality YouTube videos. The videos will range from 3 to 5 minutes, and your role will involve sourcing relevant comparison footage, editing the videos, and ensuring they align with our channel's style and standards. I will provide the voiceovers for the videos.

Responsibilities:

Edit 3 to 5-minute YouTube videos, incorporating voiceover audio.
Source and integrate relevant comparison footage to enhance video content.
Ensure videos are engaging, high-quality, and consistent with our channel’s style.
Collaborate with me to understand the video content and vision.
Implement feedback and make revisions as necessary.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing, preferably for YouTube or similar platforms.
Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Strong ability to source and integrate relevant footage.
Excellent attention to detail and creativity in video editing.
Good communication skills and ability to work collaboratively.

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 26, 2024 06:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe After Effects, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe After Effects, Education
Country: Rwanda
click to apply

Overview:

The videos will range from 3 to 5 minutes, and your role will involve sourcing relevant comparison footage, editing the videos, and ensuring they align with our channel's style and standards. I will provide the voiceovers for the videos.

Responsibilities:

Edit 3 to 5-minute YouTube videos, incorporating voiceover audio.
Source and integrate relevant comparison footage to enhance video content.
Ensure videos are engaging, high-quality, and consistent with our channel’s style.
Collaborate with me to understand the video content and vision.
Implement feedback and make revisions as necessary.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing, preferably for YouTube or similar platforms.
Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Strong ability to source and integrate relevant footage.
Excellent attention to detail and creativity in video editing.
Good communication skills and ability to work collaboratively.

Budget: $25

item.title: Video Talent - Upwork
item.description:
About GirlStyle Singapore:

Join GirlStyle Singapore, Singapore's premier Female Lifestyle & Beauty Media, celebrated for its influential presence and engaged community. With a large and dedicated follower base, GirlStyle Singapore is committed to creating compelling content that highlights beauty and lifestyle brands. Becoming a part of GirlStyle Singapore presents a distinctive opportunity for talented individuals to elevate their visibility and personal brand.

Job Description:

We are looking for a dynamic and creative Video Talent to collaborate with us on various ad shooting projects, including both photo and video content. This is a freelance role where you will be engaged on a per-job basis, not as a full-time employee.

Responsibilities:

1. Appear on camera as the primary talent in our ad shoots.
2. Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and deliver on briefs.
3. Manage project timelines effectively, ensuring timely delivery of all tasks.
4. Maintain organized file management and adhere to naming conventions for easy access and
    retrieval of assets.

Requirements:

1. Proven experience as a video talent, with a strong portfolio of past work.
2. Strong creative and storytelling skills.
3. Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

Check out our Instagram page for more about us: https://www.instagram.com/girlstyle.sg/?hl=en


Hourly Range: $10.00-$24.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 06:29 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:English, Acting, Female, Teen, Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro, Screencasting Video
Skills: English, Acting, Female, Teen, Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro, Screencasting Video

item.title: Video Editor for Shortform and Long form Youtuibe Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a talented and creative freelance video editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in all aspects of video editing, including capturing footage, editing, color grading, sound design, and motion graphics.

Responsibilities:

Edit and assemble video footage in a creative and engaging way
Work with producers and directors to ensure the final product meets the project objectives and client expectations
Incorporate music, sound effects, and other audio elements into the final product
Create visual effects and motion graphics to enhance the final product
Ensure all projects are delivered on time and within budget
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and technology advancements
Qualifications:

Proven experience as a Video Editor
Experience with Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, and Photoshop
Strong attention to detail and the ability to work independently
Excellent communication and time management skills
Strong understanding of color grading and audio mixing

References:- https://www.instagram.com/reel/C35-Xl-S9ZN/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C1vIXJJvdfI/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 06:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Premiere Pro
